languages.text: Every time the Cyber-Mastiff deals attack damage, it receives (damage dealt / 15) stacks of {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculent{/g} (up to 100).

traits.locale_text: Every time the Cyber-Mastiff deals attack damage, it receives (damage dealt / 15) stacks of {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculent{/g} (up to 100).

languages.text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.
Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.
Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

languages.text: Когда атака кибермастифа наносит урон, он получает <u>(нанесенный урон / 25)</u> уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 100 раз.
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Когда атака кибермастифа наносит урон, он получает <u>(нанесенный урон / 25)</u> уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 100 раз.
Когда атака кибермастифа наносит урон, он получает <u>(нанесенный урон / 25)</u> уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 100 раз.
Когда атака кибермастифа наносит урон, он получает <u>(нанесенный урон / 25)</u> уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}. Эффект суммируется до 100 раз.

languages.text: サイバーマスチフが攻撃でダメージを与えると、与えたダメージ ÷ 25の数だけ {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂乱{/g}のスタックを獲得する。最大は100スタック。

traits.locale_text: サイバーマスチフが攻撃でダメージを与えると、与えたダメージ ÷ 25の数だけ {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂乱{/g}のスタックを獲得する。最大は100スタック。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff inflige des dégâts en attaquant, il gagne +<u>(dégâts infligés / 25)</u> cumuls de l'effet {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Frénésie{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 100 fois.
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff inflige des dégâts en attaquant, il gagne +<u>(dégâts infligés / 25)</u> cumuls de l'effet {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Frénésie{/g}. Cumulable jusqu'à 100 fois.

languages.text: Cada vez que el cibermastín inflige daño durante un ataque, gana +<u>(daño infligido / 25)</u> acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenético{/g}. Se acumula hasta 100 veces.
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el cibermastín inflige daño durante un ataque, gana +<u>(daño infligido / 25)</u> acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenético{/g}. Se acumula hasta 100 veces.

languages.text: 每当生化獒犬的攻击造成伤害时，都会获得<u>（造成的伤害/ 25）</u>层{g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂暴{/g}效果，最多叠加100层。
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: 每当生化獒犬的攻击造成伤害时，都会获得<u>（造成的伤害/ 25）</u>层{g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂暴{/g}效果，最多叠加100层。

languages.text: Verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff mit einem Angriff Schaden, erhält er +<u>(Verursachter Schaden / 25)</u> Stapel des {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Rasend{/g}-Effektes. Kann bis zu 100-mal gestapelt werden.
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht der Cyber-Mastiff mit einem Angriff Schaden, erhält er +<u>(Verursachter Schaden / 25)</u> Stapel des {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Rasend{/g}-Effektes. Kann bis zu 100-mal gestapelt werden.

languages.text: Siber mastif, saldırırken her hasar verdiğinde +<u>(verilen hasar / 25)</u> {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}delirmiş{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır. 100 kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Each time the cyber-mastiff deals damage while attacking, it gains +<u>(damage dealt / 25)</u> stacks of the {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} effect. Stacks up to 100 times.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, saldırırken her hasar verdiğinde +<u>(verilen hasar / 25)</u> {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}delirmiş{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır. 100 kez üst üste birikebilir.
